popup_html_register.message:
The ultimate HIVE wallet.

Manage HIVE assets, and connect to HIVE applications.

Simple. Lightweight. Secure.

popup_html_unlock.message:
The ultimate HIVE wallet.

Manage HIVE assets, and connect to HIVE applications.

Simple. Lightweight. Secure.

popup_html_reset_desc.message: Wenn Sie Ihr Passwort vergessen haben, können Sie Ihre Daten löschen, müssen dann aber alle Ihre Schlüssel erneut eingeben.

popup_html_estimation_info_text.message:
Der geschätzte Kontowert ist eine ungerfähre Annäherung wie viel Ihre Tokens in USD wert sind.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass der Wert ausstehende Geschäfte, Überweisungen oder Transaktionen nicht berücksichtigt.
popup_html_estimation_info_text.description: on popup main page, click info near estimated value

popup_html_setup_text.message:
Enter your Hive account name and either the master password or the private posting or active key for that account below. Your master password will NOT be saved and will only be used to generate your private keys.

You may add / remove Hive accounts or keys at any time. If you need to create a new Hive account, you can do so at signup.hive.io/.

popup_html_import_success.message:
Import successful!

Please select the Keys you wish to store with Hive Keychain:
popup_html_import_success.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_posting.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_active.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_memo.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_posting_info.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_active_info.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_memo_info.message: Um Memos zu senden und zu empfangen
popup_html_memo_info.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_al_default_info.message: Keychain manuell sperren oder wenn der Browser geschlossen wird.

popup_html_al_locked_info.message: Keychain automatisch sperren, wenn das Gerät gesperrt ist.

popup_html_al_idle_info.message: Keychain automatisch sperren, nachdem das Browserfenster für die angegebene Anzahl von Minuten inaktiv ist.

popup_html_keychainify_text.message: This feature allows you to trigger a Hive Keychain operation when clicking on a supported link on a web page or accessing the URL directly in a browser tab.

popup_html_enable_keychainify_info.message: Derzeit werden nur Transfer-URLs von Steem Connect unterstützt.

popup_html_about_text.message: The overall idea and concept for the Hive Keychain browser extension was created on Steem by @yabapmatt who is a developer and witness on the Steem blockchain. It was primarily developed by @stoodkev who is also a Steem/Hive developer (SteemPlus) and witness. The design and development were funded by @aggroed (a top 20 Steem witness) and @yabapmatt through their joint business Splinterlands, which is a blockchain-based collectible trading card game built on top of the Steem blockchain. Be sure to check it out at https://splinterlands.io!

popup_html_pref_info.message: Anzeigen und Aktualisieren Sie die Webseiten und Transaktionstypen, für die Sie sich entschieden haben, keine Bestätigungsaufforderung zu erhalten.

popup_html_add_rpc_text.message: Fügen Sie hier Ihre RPC-Node hinzu:

popup_html_add_key.description: on manage accounts, add a previously non stored key

popup_html_add_key_text.message: Fügen Sie den privaten Schlüssel zu Ihrem Konto hinzu. Sie können ihn auch hinzufügen, indem Sie Ihren Hauptschlüssel eingeben.
popup_html_add_key_text.description: on preferences, within span will be posting/memo/active

popup_html_copied.description: on preferences when clicking on a key

popup_html_change_password_text.message: Geben Sie Ihr altes Passwort zur Bestätigung ein und wählen Sie dann ein neues Passwort.

popup_html_transfer_funds.description: When initiating a HIVE or HBD transfer

popup_html_balance.description: When initiating a HIVE or HBD transfer. $1 is a variable that will be replaced by a currency name.

popup_html_loading.description: When initiating a HIVE or HBD transfer and the balance is loading.

popup_html_memo_optional.description: When initiating a HIVE or HBD transfer

popup_html_transfer_confirm_text.message:
Bitte bestätigen Sie Ihren Transfer.
Dies kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

popup_html_tokens_settings_text.message: Token Information ansehen und auswählen welche Token angezeigt werden sollen. Lernen Sie mehr über benutzerdefinierte Token auf der Steem blockchain: https://steem-engine.com.

popup_html_tokens_send_text.message: Das Senden Ihrer Token kann bis zu 30 Sekunden in Anspruch nehmen, bitte haben Sie Geduld.

popup_html_token_confirm_text.message:
Bitte bestätigen Sie Ihren Transfer.
Dies kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

popup_html_current.description: Main page > Power Up . Current HP balance

popup_html_powerup_text.message: Power Up your HIVE to transform it in Hive Power.

popup_html_powerdown_text.message: Power Down your Hive Power to get liquid HIVE. The entire Power Down process will take 13 weeks.

popup_html_powering_down.description: Main page > Power Down. When a power down has been started

popup_html_delegations_text.message: You may delegate your Hive Power (HP) to another user. Click on the Outgoing amount to review or make changes.

popup_html_incoming.description: Main page > Delegate. Incoming delegations ($1 is a variable, should be HP)

popup_html_delegate_to_user.description: Main page > Delegate. Confirm a delegation

popup_html_total_outgoing.description: Main page > Delegate > Click on Outgoing

popup_html_total_incoming.description: Main page > Delegate > Click on Incoming

popup_password_regex.message: Ihr Passwort muss mindestens 8 Zeichen lang sein und einen Kleinbuchstaben, einen Großbuchstaben und eine Ziffer enthalten oder mindestens 16 Zeichen lang sein.

popup_html_chose_add_method.message:
You can add your keys by entring a private key or your master password.
Alternatively, you can specify an authorized account or import your keys.

popup_html_auth_text.message: Add the new account by specifying an account that has authority over it, and that is already saved in Hive Keychain.

import_html_text.message:
Import your keys from another Keychain instance using a .kc file.

You need to use the same master password on both instances to decrypt the keys.

import_html_error.message:
There was an error importing your keys.
Make sure you that you are using the same master key than when you exported the file.
